text: Morez is a former commune of the Jura department in Bourgogne-Franche-Comté in eastern France. On 1 January 2016, it was merged into the new commune of Hauts-de-Bienne.Arrêté préfectoral 29 December 2015 The town is mostly known for the manufacture of spectacles. From 1680 to 1920, Morez was with Morbier the center of Comtoise clock production. ==Population== == Gallery == Image:Viaducs-Morez.JPG|Train bridges over Morez Image:Mairie Morez.jpg|Town hall of Morez Image:Gaine Comtoise.jpg|Comtoise clock == See also == * Communes of the Jura department == References == Category:Former communes of Jura (department) Category:Populated places disestablished in 2016
title: Morez
